author: Simon Difford
description: Light and refreshing. One to serve alongside the cucumber sandwiches!Also, consider serving as a Spritz: Pour 90ml/3oz Prosecco, 45ml/1.5oz Botanical Cucumber & Mint and 60ml/2oz soda water into an ice-filled glass and briefly stir.
name: Cucumber & Mint Seltz

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
